協防沙特應對伊朗 美軍再派B52H轟炸機

02 Nov 2019, 03:56

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月02日訊】為協防應對伊朗威脅，美軍一架B52H戰略轟炸機1日(週五)在沙特空軍4架F15C戰機護航下，低空飛越蘇爾坦親王空軍基地。這是美方一週內第二度向沙特派出轟炸機。
美國空軍表示，這架B52H隸屬於派駐英國的轟炸機特遣隊，在與沙特部隊聯合訓練，以支援兩國的共同地區安全利益。
同時，美軍也派駐卡塔爾的KC135空中加油機，飛往蘇丹王子空軍基地(Prince Sultan Air Base，PSAB)，途中為一架F22空中加油。這是自1998後，首次有美軍空中加油機飛抵沙特。
上月25日，2架B1B轟炸機從美國南達科他州的埃爾斯沃思空軍基地起飛，前往蘇丹王子空軍基地(Prince Sultan Air Base，PSAB)並短暫停留，期間與派駐沙特的美軍F22隱形戰機及EA18電子作戰機，在波斯灣上空聯合訓練。

Coordinating against Saudi Arabia, responding to Iran, sending US B52H bomber

02 Nov 2019, 03:56

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 02, 2019] In order to cope with the Iranian threat, a US B52H strategic bomber flew over the Sultan Prince Air Force Base at low altitude on the 1st (Friday) under the escort of four F15C fighters of the Saudi Air Force. This is the second time the US has sent a bomber to Saudi Arabia in a week.
The US Air Force said that the B52H is part of a bomber contingent stationed in the United Kingdom and is training with Saudi forces to support the common regional security interests of both countries.
At the same time, the US military also dispatched the KC135 aerial tanker in Qatar to the Prince Sultan Air Base (PSAB) to refuel the F22 in the air. This is the first time since 1998 that a US air tanker flew to Saudi Arabia.
On the 25th of last month, two B1B bombers took off from Ellsworth Air Force Base in South Dakota, USA, and went to Prince Sultan Air Base (PSAB) for a short stay. During the period, they joined the US military F22 stealth fighters stationed in Saudi Arabia. EA18 electronic warfare aircraft, joint training over the Persian Gulf.
(Editor: Lu Yongxin)
